tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Today we recognized heroes from @StateDept’s rich history: the U.S. diplomatic community serving in Europe during World War I. Experts from @HistoryAtState shared the stories of their creative and heroic efforts in the face of unprecedented global challenges. #HeroesofUSDiplomacy pic.twitter.com/qNQyc1pRWB
